layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 197x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 195x54
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 195x24
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,2) size 191x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=2]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 187x19
                text run at (2,2) width 187: "This cell spans two columns"
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,28) size 195x24
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,28) size 94x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (21,2) size 52x19
                text run at (21,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (98,28) size 95x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (21,2) size 53x19
